title: About

content:
This is a list of technologies and tools Iâ€™m currently trying to learn and the reasons why I choose to do so:
2023 Technology Website Description Markdown Markup language to create technical documentation. Will come handy while working on this website and later with Obsidian. Hugo The building blocks of this website. Because wordpress is so mainstream.... Blowfish A theme for Hugo that makes this website look the way it does. Github Because learning version control and collaborative tools is a good thing for those who work with other human beings. Vim Because I want to tell people Vim is my editor of choice. Will I ever quit using the mouse or die trying?. Obsidian I plan on taking smart notes to create a second brain that hopefully functions better than mine. ICS2
CISSP Hopefully the tools above help me create a system that allows me to obtain the Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) certification. I guess I will need to find other excuses to continue procrastinating.
